title: Xiaomi Pad 5 will launch in India later this month
content:
After 3 years of hiatus, Xiaomi made a comeback to the Android tablet segment with the Xiaomi Pad 5 series launch last year. Originally exclusive to China, the tablet arrived in Europe in September. And now, nearly nine months later, Xiaomi is finally ready to launch its flagship tablet in India. According to tipster Yogesh

The post Xiaomi Pad 5 will launch in India later this month appeared first on xda-developers.
description: According to tipster Yogesh Brar, Xiaomi will launch the Xiaomi Pad 5 alongside the Xiaomi 12 Pro later this month.
